oai_dc:dc.dc:title: J. G. Decker letter to his parents from Camp Willlich
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter written in German from John G. Decker to his parents. He comments on marching and facing the enemy in battle. The stationery features an image of General George McClellan along with the words "The Liberator of Western Virginia" and a message from the general. See also the John G. Decker Papers, Mf. 1964.
